about.name: Mohamed Ibrahim
about.description: I am a frontend developer with a passion for React. I have a strong background in JavaScript and React.
about.education: I have completed a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, from Benha University, Egypt. I am passionate with a focus on web development.
about.beliefAndGoal: I believe that web development is an exciting and creative field that allows me to express my creativity and problem solving skills. I am always seeking out new and exciting ways to learn and grow.
